name: Retro Classix: BreakThru
storyline:
One-Way Road Trip

The situation is critical. Our most revolutionary fighter jet, the PK430, has crashed deep behind enemy lines and it’s only a matter of time before our adversaries discover all of its highly advanced secrets. This is a moment of desperation, and there is no time to weigh our options. You must drive deep into enemy territory to recover the PK430 using the military’s most advanced land vehicle, capable of leaping high into the air at the push of a button. This is a one-way trip, pilot — you’re coming back home in that fighter jet, or not at all.
summary: Recover a captured fighter jet from deep within enemy territory in Data East's thrilling arcade land-based shmup. Break through enemy lines with your high-speed vehicle capable of blowing away enemy forces and leaping across vast chasms. You're coming home in that fighter jet, or not at all.
